summary: Employers monitor workers for many reasons such as tracking their safety or productivity. This Q&A examines digital surveillance’s effects on workers. It’s our second on this topic. Digital surveillance can positively and negatively affect workers’ physical and mental health. For example, it can alert them to potential health problems and increase their sense of safety. title: Digital Surveillance: Potential Effects on Workers and Roles of Federal Agencies
